executiveSummary: David Restiano and Dr. Dan Stats from Point Pleasant, New Jersey pitched 'Sore Soap,' a do-it-yourself therapeutic soap designed to replicate physical therapy techniques. They requested $100,000 for 10% equity and successfully secured a deal of $100,000 for 20% plus physical therapy consults. The product combines muscle scraping techniques with all-natural ingredients to improve soft tissue health and has demonstrated initial sales success.
keyDecisions: Deal agreed: $100,000 investment for 20% equity plus included physical therapy consults.

actionItems.task: Incorporate therapeutic use instructions into daily product guidance

Leverage Mark's business expertise to expand operations and fill business gaps

nextSteps: Implement investment and equity agreement, utilize Mark's business experience, continue scaling direct-to-consumer sales, and expand product usage guidance for customers.
